## closestPointLine variable

Returns closest point to `p` on infinite line defined by points `a` and `b`<!-- -->. Use `closestPointSegment` to only consider the actual line segment between these two points.

 closestPointSegment

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
closestPointLine: (p: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, a: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, b: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>) => Vec
```
